ServiceOptionsType.description: This object describes service options, data transformations and output formats.

SubsetTypes.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported subsetting requests.

VariableAggregationSupportedMethods.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported methods of variable aggregation.

SupportedInputProjections.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported input projections types.

SupportedOutputProjections.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported output projections types.

InterpolationTypes.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported interpolation types.

SupportedInputFormats.description: The project element describes the list of input format names supported by the service.

SupportedOutputFormats.description: The project element describes the list of output format names supported by the service.

SupportedReformattings.description: The project element describes the list of format name combinations which explicitly state which re-formatting options are available. These are entered as pairs of values, e.g. if NetCDF-3 -> NetCDF-4 is a valid supported reformatting, these two values would be entered as a pair.

MaxGranules.description: This field indicates the maximum number of granules which this service can process with one request.

SupportedReformattingsPairType.description: This object describes the supported reformatting pairs, e.g. NetCDF4 -> [COG]. For every input there is 1 or more outputs.

SupportedInputFormat.description: This element is used to identify the name of the supported input format in the pair.

SupportedOutputFormats.description: This element is used to identify the name of all supported output formats for the provided input format.

SupportedProjectionType.description: This element is used to identify the input projection type of the variable.

ProjectionName.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported projection types.
enum: NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic North
WGS 84 / NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic North
NSIDC EASE Grid North and South (Lambert EA)
WGS 84 / North Pole LAEA Bering Sea
WGS 84 / Pseudo-Mercator -- Spherical Mercator, Google Maps, OpenStreetMap, Bing, ArcGIS, ESRI
Google Maps Global Mercator -- Spherical Mercator
NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic South
WGS 84 / NSIDC Sea Ice Polar Stereographic South

ProjectionLatitudeOfCenter.description: This element is used to identify the origin of the x-coordinates at the center of the projection.

ProjectionLongitudeOfCenter.description: This element is used to identify the origin of the y-coordinates at the center of the projection.

ProjectionFalseEasting.description: This element is used to identify the linear value applied to the origin of the y-coordinates. False easting and northing values are usually applied to ensure that all the x and y values are positive.

ProjectionFalseNorthing.description: This element is used to identify the linear value applied to the origin of the x-coordinates. False easting and northing values are usually applied to ensure that all the x and y values are positive.

ProjectionAuthority.description: This element is used to identify the authority, expressed as the authority code, for the list of supported projection types.

ProjectionUnit.description: This element is used to identify the projection unit of measurement.

ProjectionDatumName.description: This element is used to identify the projection datum name.

SubsetTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the subset type of the variable.

VariableAggregationTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the list of supported methods of variable aggregation.

InterpolationTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the interpolation type of the variable.

SupportedFormatTypeEnum.description: This element contains a list of file formats supported by the service.

URLType.description: Represents the Internet site where you can directly access the back-end service.

Description.description: Description of the web page at this URL.

URLContentType.description: A keyword describing the distinct content type of the online resource to this resource. (e.g., 'DISTRIBUTION URL').

Type.description: A keyword describing the type of the online resource to this resource. This helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'GET DATA', 'GET SERVICE', 'GET VISUALIZATION').

Subtype.description: A keyword describing the subtype of the online resource to this resource. This further helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'OPENDAP DATA', 'OPENSEARCH', 'WEB COVERAGE SERVICES (WCS)', 'WEB FEATURE SERVICES (WFS)', 'WEB MAPPING SERVICES (WMS)', 'SIMPLE SUBSET WIZARD (SSW)').

URLValue.description: The URL for the relevant web page (e.g., the URL of the responsible organization's home page, the URL of the collection landing page, the URL of the download site for the collection).

RelatedUrlType.description: Represents Internet sites that contain information related to the data, as well as related Internet sites such as project home pages, related data archives/servers, metadata extensions, online software packages, web mapping services, and calibration/validation data.

Description.description: Description of the web page at this URL.

URLContentType.description: A keyword describing the distinct content type of the online resource to this resource. (e.g., 'COLLECTION URL', 'PUBLICATION URL', 'VISUALIZATION URL').

Type.description: A keyword describing the type of the online resource to this resource. This helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'GET DATA', 'GET SERVICE', 'GET VISUALIZATION').

Subtype.description: A keyword describing the subtype of the online resource to this resource. This further helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'OPENDAP DATA', 'OPENSEARCH', 'WEB COVERAGE SERVICES (WCS)', 'WEB FEATURE SERVICES (WFS)', 'WEB MAPPING SERVICES (WMS)', 'SIMPLE SUBSET WIZARD (SSW)').

URL.description: The URL for the relevant web page (e.g., the URL of the responsible organization's home page, the URL of the collection landing page, the URL of the download site for the collection).

OnlineResourceType.description: Describes the online resource pertaining to the data.

Linkage.description: The URL of the website related to the online resource.

Protocol.description: The protocol of the linkage for the online resource, such as https, svn, ftp, etc.

ApplicationProfile.description: The application profile holds the name of the application that can service the data. For example if the URL points to a word document, then the applicationProfile is MS-Word.

Name.description: The name of the online resource.

Description.description: The description of the online resource.

Function.description: The function of the online resource. In ISO where this class originated the valid values are: download, information, offlineAccess, order, and search.

ServiceKeywordType.description: Enables specification of Earth science service keywords related to the service.  The Earth Science Service keywords are chosen from a controlled keyword hierarchy maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

ServiceOrganizationType.description: Defines a service organization which is either an organization or institution responsible for distributing, archiving, or processing the data via a service, etc.

Roles.description: This is the roles of the service organization.

ShortName.description: This is the short name of the service organization.

LongName.description: This is the long name of the service organization.

OnlineResource.description: This is the URL of the service organization.

Roles.description: This is the roles of the service contact.

ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the service contact.

GroupName.description: This is the contact group name.

Roles.description: This is the roles of the service contact.

ContactInformation.description: This is the contact information of the service contact.

ContactInformationType.description: Defines the contact information of a service organization or service contact.

RelatedUrls.description: A URL associated with the contact, e.g., the home page for the service provider which is responsible for the service.

ServiceHours.description: Time period when the contact answers questions or provides services.

ContactInstruction.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the responsible party.

ContactMechanismType.description: Method for contacting the service contact. A contact can be available via phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

Type.description: This is the method type for contacting the responsible party - phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

Value.description: This is the contact phone number, email address, Facebook address, or Twitter handle associated with the contact method.

ServiceOrganizationShortNameType.description: The unique name of the service organization.

ServiceOrganizationRoleEnum.description: Defines the possible values of a service provider role.

LongNameType.description: The expanded or long name related to the short name.

ServiceTypeEnum.description: This element is used to identify the type of the service.

ServiceQualityType.description: This object describes service quality, composed of the quality flag, the quality flagging system, traceability and lineage.

QualityFlag.description: The quality flag for the service.

Traceability.description: The quality traceability of the service.

Lineage.description: The quality lineage of the service.

AccessConstraintsType.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the service, software, or tool.

UseConstraintsType.description: Information on how the item (service, software, or tool) may or may not be used after access is granted. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the item. Providers may request acknowledgement of the item from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness.

LicenseUrl.description: The web address of the license associated with the service.

LicenseText.description: The text of the license associated with the service.

AncillaryKeywordsType.description: Words or phrases to further describe the service, software, or tool.

ServiceContactRoleEnum.description: Defines the possible values of a service provider role.

ContactMechanismTypeEnum.description: Defines the possible contact mechanism types.

AddressType.description: This entity contains the physical address details for the contact.

StreetAddresses.description: An address line for the street address, used for mailing or physical addresses of organizations or individuals who serve as contacts for the service.

City.description: The city portion of the physical address.

StateProvince.description: The state or province portion of the physical address.

Country.description: The country of the physical address.

PostalCode.description: The zip or other postal code portion of the physical address.

OperationMetadataType.description: This class describes the signature of the operational metadata provided by the service.

OperationName.description: This element contains the name of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

DistributedComputingPlatform.description: This element contains the distributed computing platform (protocol) for the operation(s) made possible via this service.

OperationDescription.description: This element contains the description of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

InvocationName.description: This element contains the name of the invocation of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

ConnectPoint.description: This element contains the URL of the invocation of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

OperationChainedMetadata.description: This element contains the name of the chained operation(s) made possible via this service.

CoupledResource.description: This element contains important information about the resource(s) coupled to this service.

Parameters.description: This element contains important information about the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

ConnectPointType.description: This element contains the URL of the invocation of the operation(s) made possible via this service.

ResourceName.description: This element contains the name of the resource(s) coupled to this service.

ResourceLinkage.description: This element contains the URL of the resource(s) coupled to this service.

ResourceDescription.description: This element contains the description of the resource(s) coupled to this service.

OperationChainedMetadataType.description: This element contains the name of the chained operation(s) made possible via this service.

OperationChainName.description: TThis element contains the name of the operation chain made possible via this service.

OperationChainDescription.description: This element contains the description of the operation chain made possible via this service.

CoupledResourceType.description: This element contains the name of the chained operation(s) made possible via this service.

ScopedName.description: This element contains the name of the resource(s) coupled to this service.

DataResourceDOI.description: This element contains the DOI for the resource(s) coupled to this service.

DataResource.description: This element contains the data identification and scope for the resource(s) coupled to this service.

CouplingType.description: This element contains the coupling type for the resource(s) coupled to this service.

DataResourceType.description: The DataResource class describes the layers, feature types or coverages available from the service.

DataResourceIdentifier.description: The identifier of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

DataResourceSourceType.description: The resource type of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

DataResourceSpatialExtent.description: The spatial extent of the coverage available from the service. These are coordinate pairs which describe either the point, line string, or polygon representing the spatial extent. The bounding box is described by the west, south, east and north ordinates

DataResourceSpatialType.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

SpatialResolution.description: The spatial resolution of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

SpatialResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the spatial resolution of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

DataResourceTemporalExtent.description: The temporal extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

DataResourceTemporalType.description: The temporal extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

TemporalResolution.description: TThe temporal resolution of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

TemporalResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the temporal resolution of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

RelativePath.description: Path relative to the root URL for the layer, feature type or coverage service.

ParameterType.description: This element contains important information about the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

ParameterName.description: This element contains the name of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

ParameterDirection.description: This element contains the direction of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

ParameterDescription.description: This element contains the description of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

ParameterOptionality.description: This element contains the optionality of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service

ParameterRepeatability.description: This element contains the repeatability of the parameter associated with the resource(s) coupled to this service.

CoordinatesType.description: The coordinates consist of a latitude and longitude.

LineStringType.description: The line string consists of two points: a start point and an end ppint.

StartPoint.description: The start point of the line string.

EndPoint.description: The end point of the line string.

SpatialBoundingBoxType.description: The bounding box consists of west bounding, south bounding, east bounding and north bounding coordinates and the CRS identifier.

CRSIdentifier.description: The CRS identifier of the bounding box.

WestBoundingCoordinate.description: The west bounding coordinate of the bounding box.

SouthBoundingCoordinate.description: The south bounding coordinate of the bounding box.

EastBoundingCoordinate.description: The east bounding coordinate of the bounding box.

NorthBoundingCoordinate.description: The north bounding coordinate of the bounding box.

GeneralGridType.description: The general grid consists of a CRS Identifier and an Axis.

CRSIdentifier.description: The CRS identifier (srsName) of the general grid.

Axis.description: The grid axis identifiers, all distinct within a grid.

AxisType.description: The axis consists of an extent and grid information.

AxisLabel.description: The axis label of the general grid.

GridResolution.description: The resolution of the general grid.

Extent.description: The extent of the general grid.

LowerBound.description: The lowest value along this grid axis.

UpperBound.description: The highest value along this grid axis.

UOMLabel.description: The unit of measure in which values along this axis are expressed.

SpatialPoints.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a point.

SpatialLineStrings.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a line string.

SpatialBoundingBox.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a bounding box.

GeneralGrid.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a general grid.

SpatialPolygons.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage described by a polygon.

DataResourceTimePoints.description: Points in time representing the temporal extent of the layer or coverage.

TimeFormat.description: Time format representing time point of the temporal extent.

TimeValue.description: Time value of the time point of temporal extent.

Description.description: Description of the time value of the temporal extent.

DataResourceSpatialTypeEnum.description: The spatial extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service. These are coordinate pairs which describe either the point, line string, boundingbox, general grid, or polygon representing the spatial extent.

CRSIdentifierTypeEnum.description: The CRS Identifier of the spatial extent, expressed as a code.

DataResourceTemporalTypeEnum.description: The temporal extent of the layer, feature type or coverage available from the service.

CouplingTypeEnum.description: This element contains the coupling type for the resource(s) coupled to this service. Examples are: 'LOOSE' - this is where a variety of data sources (which are not specified precisely) are used to generate the resource, 'MIXED' - this is where a combination of well-cited data sources are used to generate the resource, 'TIGHT - this is where a single well-cited data source is used to generate the resource.

DistributedComputingPlatformTypeEnum.description: This element contains the distributed computing platform (protocol) for the operation(s) made possible via this service.

Name.description: The name of the service, software, or tool.

LongName.description: The long name of the service, software, or tool.

Type.description: The type of the service, software, or tool.

Version.description: The edition or version of the service.

VersionDescription.description: This field provides users with information on what changes were included in the most recent version.

LastUpdatedDate.description: This element describes the latest date when the service was most recently pushed to production for support and maintenance.

URL.description: This element contains important information about the universal resource locator (URL) for the service.

Description.description: A brief description of the service.

ServiceKeywords.description: Allows for the specification of Earth Science Service keywords that are representative of the service, software, or tool being described. The controlled vocabulary for Service Keywords is maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

ServiceOrganizations.description: The service provider, or organization, or institution responsible for developing, archiving, and/or distributing the service, software, or tool.

ContactGroups.description: This is the contact groups of the service.

ContactPersons.description: This is the contact persons of the service.

ServiceQuality.description: Information about the quality of the service, software, or tool, or any quality assurance procedures followed in development.

AccessConstraints.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the service, software, or tool.

UseConstraints.description: Information on how the item (service, software, or tool) may or may not be used after access is granted. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the item. Providers may request acknowledgement of the item from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness.

AncillaryKeywords.description: Words or phrases to further describe the service, software, or tool.

ServiceOptions.description: This element contains important information about the Unique Resource Locator for the service.

OperationMetadata.description: This class describes the signature of the operational metadata provided by the service.
